segments.text: I notice the boy climbing that two-step stool; it looks precarious, almost comically so.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is impressive, reaching for the cookie jar with such eagerness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my heart drops a little as I see how unsteady the stool is beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him tumbling backward sends a shiver down my spine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the thud before it happens, and I wish he would just get down already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister stands there, hopeful, her palm outstretched like a flower reaching for the sun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but admire their teamwork, even if it’s reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR
